text: 10,000 Kids and a Cop is a 1948 documentary short directed by Charles Barton. It is about the philanthropic work of the Lou Costello Jr. Youth Foundation in Los Angeles, California. The foundation was named after the comedian's son who died in 1943 aged 1. The movie was originally distributed for free to U.S. film exhibitors. == Cast == * Bud Abbott * Lou Costello * James Stewart * William Bendix * Brenda Joyce == References == Category:Abbott and Costello Category:1948 movies Category:Documentary movies
title: 10,000 Kids and a Cop
